arStrings.szText: {c_important}Trample{/c} deals {c_number}[SF_19 * 100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage. This bonus is reduced by {c_number}[SF_20 * 100|%x|]{/c} for each enemy hit after the first.
Casting {c_important}Trample{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
